title: Epistola Consolatoria
creator: nan
subject: Historische Drucke
source: Epistola Consolatoria  Qva Viri Perillvstris Atqve Excellentissimi Domini Domini Caroli De Dieskav Hereditarii In Dieskav Bendorf Et Lochav Cetera Potentissimo Borvssiae Regi A Secretioribvs Consiliis Itemqve Regiminis Qvod Est In Dvcatv Magdebvrgico Senatoris Aerariiqve Pvblici In Eodem Tractv Directoris Gravissimi Domini Svi Longe Benignissimi Dolorem Ex Obitv ...
